explains: n. 巫师；萨满教的道士；僧人

sentences.en: For example, where is the proof that the man in the picture is a shaman?
sentences.cn: 例如，哪里有证据可以证明画中的人就是巫师？

sentences.en: Shaman tambourines - practically everybody has ever heard about them but not everybody has seen them!
sentences.cn: 萨满铃鼓-也许每个人都听说过，但是不是所有人都见过！

sentences.en: Sometimes it appears that Ms Abramovic has cast herself in the role of the artist as priestess or shaman.
sentences.cn: 有个时候，阿布拉莫维奇女士好像把她的艺术家身份当成了女祭司或巫师。
